main_definition: A derogatory term used to describe a bus filled with rowdy, unruly or heavily intoxicated people.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to refer to a crowded bus carrying disorderly passengers
meanings_and_examples.example: After the late-night event, there were bangbuses on every street corner.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Describes a situation or environment that is chaotic and lacking control
meanings_and_examples.example: The party got out of hand and ended up being like a real bangbus scenario.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal term used to describe the rowdy behavior typically associated with teenagers on buses
meanings_and_examples.example: The high school students were behaving like they were in a full-blown bangbus.
